author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police have detained seven men, who were arrested in Haryana on February 8 for committing online credit card frauds, running to several lakhs of rupees, under Goondas Act

The gang led by R. Nitin Singla (26) along with six others executed the scam by getting personal and card details including date of birth, CVV/PIN numbers, credit/debit card numbers, expiry date and even OTP from the bank customers in the guise of calling from customer care offices. On getting the personal and card details the gang made payments to cellphone and online payment companies and for making vishing calls. V. Vikas (27), M. Riasath Khan (36), K. Gulshan Kumar 24), H. Jitinder (30), R. Shamanram (24) and B. Krishnan Chawla (55) have been arrested.
title: Seven detained under Goondas Act
